By: Rand Fishkin December 12, 2005 SERoundTable Forums Public Relations The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Barry Schwartz has finally opened the new SERoundtable forums. He's got quite an impressive staff - dazzlindonna, phoenix, pk_synths, sufyaaan and even Darrin Ward (yes, the OG himself). I'll be modding there, too and look forward to seeing this new forum take off. Barry's certainly got a big following already, so it should be quite something. Copied! Back to Top
